title: Agate Fossil Beds National Monument: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases             2016 Get Outside for "First Hike" of the Year   Find Birds in your Park at Agate Fossil Beds during the 18th Annual Great Backyard Bird Count   Agate Fossil Beds National Monument Hosts a Bright Star Production at Scottsbluff Nebraska's Historic Midwest Theater       2015 Moropus Chosen as 2015 National Fossil Day Mascot Agate Fossil Beds National Monument Reaches Students Through Distance Learning Use Agate Fossil Beds to Participate in the Great Backyard Bird Count Memorial Day Weekend is the Beginning of Longer Hours and "Niobrara Meanderings" at Agate Fossil Beds National Monument Many Activities are Included in the Friendship Celebration Weekend at Agate Fossil Beds National Monument, June 5 - 7 Enjoy the Prairie Blooms on Two Walking Trails at Agate Fossil Beds National Monument and Enjoy Two Programs During Nebraska Wildflower Week The Next "Niobrara Meanderings" Features Fossils and the Fur Trade "Bone Wars" -
